thread.title: BRIEF-Shirohato issues 1.7 mln shares through private placement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shirohato issues 1.7 mln shares through private placement
text:
March 6(Reuters) - Shirohato Co Ltd
* Says it issued 1.7 million shares through private placement to Odakyu Electric Railway Co., Ltd., at the price of 748 yen per share, and raised 1.27 billion yen in total
* Payment date on March 6
* Says its second biggest shareholderâ€™s voting power in the company was diluted to 8.2 percent from 11.3 percent, effective March 6
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/zbRVm5
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
